00011 # /* See http://www.boost.org for most recent version. */
00012 #
00013 # ifndef BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_DETAIL_CHECK_HPP
00014 # define BOOST_PREPROCESSOR_DETAIL_CHECK_HPP
00015 #
00016 # include <boost/preprocessor/cat.hpp>
00017 # include <boost/preprocessor/config/config.hpp>
00018 #
00019 # /* BOOST_PP_CHECK */
00020 #
00021 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MWCC()
00022 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK(x, type) BOOST_PP_CHECK_D(x, type)
00023 # else
00024 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK(x, type) BOOST_PP_CHECK_OO((x, type))
00025 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_OO(par) BOOST_PP_CHECK_D ## par
00026 # endif
00027 #
00028 # if ~BOOST_PP_CONFIG_FLAGS() & BOOST_PP_CONFIG_MSVC()
00029 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_D(x, type) BOOST_PP_CHECK_1(BOOST_PP_CAT(BOOST_PP_CHECK_RESULT_, type x))
00030 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_1(chk) BOOST_PP_CHECK_2(chk)
00031 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_2(res, _) res
00032 # else
00033 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_D(x, type) BOOST_PP_CHECK_1(type x)
00034 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_1(chk) BOOST_PP_CHECK_2(chk)
00035 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_2(chk) BOOST_PP_CHECK_3((BOOST_PP_CHECK_RESULT_ ## chk))
00036 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_3(im) BOOST_PP_CHECK_5(BOOST_PP_CHECK_4 im)
00037 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_4(res, _) res
00038 #    define BOOST_PP_CHECK_5(res) res
00039 # endif
00040 #
00041 # define BOOST_PP_CHECK_RESULT_1 1, BOOST_PP_NIL
00042 #
00043 # endif
